claimRoyalties(address).details: Executes via IPAccount.execute() as per Story Protocol architecture

params.storyIPId: Story Protocol IP ID (must be registered)

getVaultIPAccount(address).details: Returns the IPAccount (Smart Contract Account) for the vault's IP Asset

returns.isRegistered: Whether vault has Story IP ID

returns.isLiquidatable: True if loan can be liquidated

params.ipCollateral: IP asset address to use as collateral

registerDerivativeIP(address,uint256,str.details: Executes via IPAccount.execute() as per Story Protocol architecture

params.hash: Content hash of the IP Asset
params.name: Name of the IP Asset

returns.storyIPId: The registered Story Protocol IP ID

sellLicenseWithSharing(address,string,ui.details: Executes via IPAccount.execute() as per Story Protocol architecture

setRoyaltyPolicy(address,address,uint256.details: Executes via IPAccount.execute() as per Story Protocol architecture

returns.ipOwner: The owner of the IP Asset

MIN_CVS_RATIO().notice: Minimum CVS required for loan (2x loan amount)

calculateAccruedInterest(uint256).notice: Calculate accrued interest for a loan

createVault(bytes32,string).notice: Create vault with existing Story Protocol IP ID

getIPAccountByStoryIPId(string).notice: Get IPAccount address for a Story IP ID

getLicenseInfo(string).notice: Get license information from Story Protocol

getLoanDetails(uint256).notice: Get loan details with current status

getPendingRevenue(address).notice: Get pending revenue for vault creator

getStoryIPId(address).notice: Get Story IP ID for vault

getVaultIPAccount(address).notice: Get IPAccount address for a vault's Story IP Asset

getVaultLicenses(address).notice: Get all licenses for a vault

hasStoryIPId(address).notice: Check if vault has Story IP ID

registerDerivativeIP(address,uint256,str.notice: Register derivative IP and create vault

registerIPAndCreateVault(bytes32,uint8,s.notice: Register IP Asset on Story Protocol and create vault

sellLicenseWithSharing(address,string,ui.notice: Sell license with automatic royalty sharing for derivatives

setRoyaltyPolicy(address,address,uint256.notice: Set royalty policy for vault's IP

setVaultLoanTerms(address,(uint256,uint2.notice: Set custom loan terms for vault

storyIPAssetRegistry().notice: Story Protocol IP Asset Registry address

storySPG().notice: Story Protocol SPG (Story Protocol Gateway) address

verifyIPAsset(string).notice: Verify IP Asset exists on Story Protocol
